## Checklist

<!-- Check all that apply -->
- [ ] JSON file is valid and follows the schema
- [ ] Filename is lowercase with hyphens (e.g., `my-package.json`)
- [ ] Description is under 200 characters
- [ ] GitHub repository exists and is accessible
- [ ] Project is open source
- [ ] Project uses Zig (has `build.zig` or `build.zig.zon`)
- [ ] Project is actively maintained (updated in last year)
- [ ] I have tested the JSON locally
